programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.sub-title: Aliens Uncovered: Buried Cities and Lost Tribes Part 2
programme.desc: Hidden in the Grand Canyon, in the areas that are off limits to modern civilization, is a group of ancestors that have become lost over time. With the help of a Hopi Elder, we uncovered this lost group and discover an ancient connection.

programme.title: Paranormal Contact
programme.desc: Jeff DeEll, Adam Myles, and Kelly Klassen explore haunted locations along Canada’s east coast, seeking contact with the dead and uncovering the hidden stories that linger in the shadows. Guided by intuition, research, and firsthand encounters, they venture deep into the unknown to give a voice to the spirits still waiting to be heard.

programme.title: Unveiled
programme.desc: Embark on an enthralling journey with "Unveiled," a captivating TV series exploring the enigmatic world of aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history. Each episode unveils astonishing encounters, hidden truths, and thought-provoking revelations that challenge reality itself. Discover a thrilling blend of scientific exploration, historical analysis, and captivating storytelling as "Unveiled" pushes the boundaries of human understanding and leaves audiences captivated by the mysteries of the universe.

programme.title: Ghost Cases
programme.desc: Paul and Holly investigate the Fairmont Algonquin Resort to try and contact the ghost of a jilted bride in room 473.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 8
programme.desc: Science fiction or sci-fi is a genre of speculative fiction which typically deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts such as advanced science and technology. A fan favorite, this documentary explores science fiction and some of the crazy and genius ideas that have come out of it.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Several energy healers claim they are able to produce spontaneous miraculous healings through a laying on of hands. Claims of similar such healings by a man in a remote village in Brazil, known as John of God are also examined. A skeptic argues that the subtle energy said to be at work during these healings is not detectable and claims of spontaneous healings have not been independently verified nor subjected to proper scientific scrutiny.

programme.title: Classic Canadian Sasquatch Stories
programme.desc: For as long as human beings have braved the mountain passes and rugged trails of the Canadian Rockies, stories have been told of a huge, elusive, man-like creature that haunts the slopes. Though scarcer and more obscure than its famous West Coast counterpart, this mysterious alpine monster has nonetheless found its way into foundational ethnological treatises on Canada’s First Nations, and into seminal works on the Sasquatch phenomenon. In this episode, we will delve into classic legends of and encounters with the wildman of the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: 4 Alleged UFOs Seen By Astronauts - Unveiled
programme.desc: “Unveiled” explores aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history, revealing astonishing encounters and truths.

programme.title: 4 Theoretical Megastructures From Big To Massive - Unveiled
programme.desc: “Unveiled” explores aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history, revealing astonishing encounters and truths.

programme.title: Classic Canadian Sasquatch Stories
programme.desc: For centuries, the indigenous peoples of Canada’s Columbia Mountains have maintained that they share their traditional territory with mountain-dwelling giants who abide in the region’s most desolate crags and canyons. In this video, we delve into classic wildman stories from the West Kootenays and Wells Gray Provincial Park.

programme.title: Classic Canadian Sasquatch Stories
programme.desc: For centuries, B.C.’s Interior Plateau has been inhabited by four Interior Salish nations, all of whom have traditional stories about wild giants with a penchant for kidnapping humans. In this episode, we take a look at wildman stories from Okanagan Country, British Columbia.

programme.title: Sir Spooks
programme.sub-title: Scary Videos You Should NOT Watch At Midnight
programme.desc: Analysis and presentations of scary videos featuring ghosts, creatures and other mysterious subjects.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 9
programme.desc: Alectromancy, clairvoyance, cartomancy. Straight out of folkloristic practices of Renaissance magic, this documentary explores the practice of predicting information about a person's life. Gaze into the crystal ball for answers about the ancient art of fortune-telling.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.sub-title: The Execution of MLK and the Framing of James Earl Ray
programme.desc: In this re-examination of the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Richard meets several researchers who provide evidence that the convicted gunman, James Earl Ray was not the real triggerman. Further the researchers claim the plot was orchestrated at the highest levels of government and law enforcement. A noted debunker in the skeptic community refutes these claims as unfounded.

programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.sub-title: Aliens Uncovered: Buried Cities and Lost Tribes Part 3
programme.desc: Hidden in the Grand Canyon, in the areas that are off limits to modern civilization, is a group of ancestors that have become lost over time. With the help of a Hopi Elder, we uncovered this lost group and discover an ancient connection.
